author: psharples
msg: Minor updates to the 'add w3c widget' dialog.  Fixes UI widget rendering & adds the author attribute.

author: hdu
msg: #i119640# fetch_tarballs should reference a specific known revision and NOT head-of-trunk

Building from a source release must not depend on the latest head of trunk because that is way too fragile. Referencing a known set of external tarballs makes building reproducible even when the current set has been completely changed.

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-4348] Fixing the way Content-Type is set for the root part of outbound attachments
